brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of RTS,S AS02A/AS01B Vaccine to Prevent Malaria
brief_summary: This is a double blinded study where 2 test vaccines will be evaluated to see if they protect persons who have never had malaria against malaria infection when bitten by mosquitoes.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Be in good general health - Be able to participate for 4-15 months Exclusion Criteria: - Pregnant or planning pregnancy - History of malaria or exposure to malaria in past 12 months - Received an investigational malaria vaccine - Past history of allergic reaction to previous immunization - Positive blood tests for HIV and specific types of hepatitis
